summary: This is an automatic email reply from a legal professional indicating they are on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams and providing contact information for AUSAs regarding the United States v. Epstein case and other matters.

persons.name: Ronnie Abrams
persons.context: Presiding judge over the trial the email author is currently involved in.

events.title: Automatic Email Reply Regarding Trial
events.description: An automatic email reply is sent indicating the author is on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams and providing contact instructions for the Epstein case.

events.title: United States v. Epstein Trial
events.description: Ongoing criminal trial referenced as case 19 Cr. 490 (RMB) against Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an automatic email reply dated August 26, 2019.
The email author is on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams.
The email provides contact instructions for AUSAs regarding the United States v. Epstein case (19 Cr. 490 (RMB)).
The document indicates ongoing legal proceedings related to Jeffrey Epstein in August 2019.
